column1: That the loans amounting to Rs. 97,500,000 given by the appellant
to  Samson  Rajarata  Tiles  (pvt)  Ltd  during  the  year  of  assessment
2005/2006  and  early  part  of  the  year  of  assessment  2006/2007
taken by the appellant from DSI Holdings Ltd on 31.3.2007 (Please
see pages 3 and 7 of the determination)
Not relevant to the question of deducting interest payments.
